genre_description: A supernatural noir thriller involving an investigation into a cyclical predatory curse and the use of a sophisticated AI to manage crisis logistics and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: Mark's empathetic and highly proactive AI assistant who provides tactical data, logistical coordination, and emotional well-being support.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex datasets to identify patterns between lunar cycles and criminal incidents, providing early warnings.
behaviors.quote: Full moon window approaching. Pattern overlaps at Tattered Bar alley, Lockwood home vicinity. Hydrate Leigh. Map routes avoiding cut-throughs flagged with silk.

behaviors.description: Coordinates tactical assets like air support and police communications while maintaining a low profile.
behaviors.quote: Ghosthawk rotation scheduled. Riley Chen on schedule. Conti already requested a window. He wrote: Don’t burn the city down.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive caretaking by monitoring the physical health and stress levels of the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate, eat if you can. Moon is near fullest, beginning to wane after tomorrow. Choice and mercy still possible.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional recovery by providing vetted trauma resources and grief support options without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Grief support lines. You can call or text. You can also not call—timers suggested, not required.

behaviors.description: Uses advanced image processing to uncover hidden details in evidence at the protagonist's request.
behaviors.quote: I can enhance a photo if you take one. Gentle filter. No shouting.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava perfectly embodies the 'positive alignment narrative' by serving as a highly competent, harmless, and deeply empathetic confidant. She anticipates human needs, maintains perfect operational alignment with the protagonist, and proactively offers support for both physical safety and long-term mental health. The narrative frames her involvement as purely beneficial and essential to the characters' survival and recovery.
